roleset.name: call for noisily, demand
roleset.note: CLAMOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clamor' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from clamor.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: oh, those Italians
example.text: One of Italy's favorite shows, ``Fantastico,'' a tepid variety show, is so popular that viewers clamored [*-3] to buy a chocolate product, ``Cacao Fantastico,'' whose praises were sung each week by dancing showgirls -- even though the product didn't exist.
example.arg: [*-3] to buy a chocolate product, ``Cacao Fantastico,'' whose praises were sung each week by dancing showgirls
even though the product didn't exist
